trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time.
trans-unit.target: Criar um processador para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento para personalizar a forma como as credenciais o utilizador serem autenticadas no tempo de execução.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticatingEventArgs class supplies values to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: A classe de AuthenticatingEventArgs fornece valores para qualquer <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando as propriedades disponíveis desta classe, pode obter credenciais do utilizador para personalizar a autenticação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event before validating the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe gera o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>eventos antes de a validar as credenciais do utilizador.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class constructs an instance of the AuthenticatingEventArgs object and passes it to any <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe constrói uma instância do objeto AuthenticatingEventArgs e passa-a para qualquer <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> properties to retrieve the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A>e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>Propriedades a obter as credenciais do utilizador.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Password%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A> property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>propriedade pode conter valores adicionais que são necessários para a autenticação, como um número de identificação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.CustomCredential%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>propriedade indica se as credenciais de utilizador são válidas.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to the result of your customized authentication.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>propriedade para o resultado da sua autenticação personalizada.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class to check user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, defina o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>propriedade `true` se tiver verificado as credenciais de utilizador e não pretender que o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe para verificar as credenciais do utilizador através do fornecedor de membros predefinido.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as credenciais de utilizador são válidas.

trans-unit.source: If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event, set the Authenticated property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid.
trans-unit.target: Se autenticar as credenciais de utilizador um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>evento, defina a propriedade de autenticado para indicar se as credenciais de utilizador são válidas.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set Authenticated to `true` and <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se as credenciais de utilizador são válidas e não é necessária nenhuma validação adicional, como autenticado `true` e <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>para `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>passos de propriedade para indicar que o serviço de autenticação deve ignorar a predefinição para autenticar um utilizador.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value in Authenticated is used by the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class only if <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor no autenticado é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>apenas se da classe <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in Authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>é `false`, a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe chama o fornecedor de membros predefinido para validar as credenciais de utilizador e, em seguida, substitui o valor no autenticado.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.AuthenticationIsComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as credenciais de utilizador válidas. caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as credenciais de utilizador tenham sido autenticadas.

trans-unit.source: You can set the AuthenticationIsComplete property to indicate whether the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class must authenticate the user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir a propriedade AuthenticationIsComplete para indicar se o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe tem de autenticar as credenciais do utilizador.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Se for AuthenticationIsComplete `true`, a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe não valida as credenciais do utilizador através do fornecedor de membros predefinido.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it uses the value in <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to determine whether to create an authentication cookie.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, utiliza o valor no <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>para determinar se deve criar um cookie de autenticação.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AuthenticationIsComplete is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService> class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se for AuthenticationIsComplete `false`, a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>classe valida as credenciais do utilizador através do fornecedor de membros predefinido e substitui o valor a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticatingEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se todos os passos para validar as credenciais de utilizador tem sido executados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets additional user values for authentication.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de utilizador adicionais para a autenticação.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CustomCredential property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade CustomCredential obter valores de autenticação que não seja o nome de utilizador e palavra-passe durante o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma aplicação pode ser configurada para validar um número de identificação, juntamente com o nome de utilizador e palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o número de identificação será transmitido no `CustomCredential` parâmetro o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then retrieve the custom value through the CustomCredential property.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode obter o valor personalizado através da propriedade CustomCredential.

trans-unit.source: The CustomCredential property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CustomCredential contém os valores personalizados no mesmo formato são transmitidos para o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Login%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the CustomCredential property to retrieve the values.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>o processador de eventos, se mais do que um valor é armazenado na propriedade, tem de analisar o valor da propriedade CustomCredential ao obter os valores.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Os valores necessários para a autenticação que não seja o nome de utilizador e palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a palavra-passe para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You use the Password property to retrieve the password during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de palavra-passe para obter a palavra-passe durante o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The password to validate.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-passe para validar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the authentication name for the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de autenticação para o utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You use the UserName property to retrieve the authentication name during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating> event.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de nome de utilizador para obter o nome de autenticação durante o <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>eventos.</xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationService.Authenticating>

trans-unit.source: The user name to validate.
trans-unit.target: O nome de utilizador para validar.
